title: Elevation feature or dome like structure above water tank/lift machine room/staircase room up to 2 m for building with height beyond 32 m & up to 70 m, 6 m for the building height beyond 70 m and up to 120 m and up to 9 m for building with height beyond 120 m with 60% voids in surface area/profile may be allowed
